articles.author: Steve Goldstein
articles.title: Need to Know: This trashy asset class can withstand a great deal more pain, fund manager says
articles.description: Junk bond yields have surpassed 8% — meaning they can absorb a rising default rate.
articles.content:
Few assets have been safe this year from the pummeling in financial markets, and junk bonds also have been rather, well, trashy. Year-to-date, the SPDR Bloomberg High Yield Bond ETF
